main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects over Selma, Alabama on October 3 and October 19, 1952.
interesting points: Witnesses reported a bright object with a visible trail during the October 19 sighting,The object was observed moving at high speeds between 2,000 and 4,000 mph on October 3,The October 3 object was seen for several hours and demonstrated evasive maneuvers,One witness described the October 19 object as initially appearing as one solid object before breaking into two parts,The sightings were documented by various civilians and were analyzed by the Air Force.
witness description: Various civilians for the October 19 sighting; single civilian for the April 28 sighting.
